name: Purple Mash
description:
Computing and digital skills across the curriculum for KS1 and KS2

Tasks will either be set in 'Work' or set as a '2Do' . If work has been set in the 'Work' folder you will need to click on Group - Remote Lesson Year 2 - Week 1 (down the left hand side). Remember to click on the little triangle not the title of the folder.
